HomePage.title: Your Partner in Aluminium Extrusion
HomePage.description: Leading solutions in aluminum extrusion technology, equipment, and consultation services for over 20 years.

chart.title: Our system works because it focuses on people. We help companies change their culture so that everyone can solve problems quickly and make equipment work better.
chart.subtitle: Inalcom helps make these changes permanent and helps businesses reach their full potential.

aboutUs.point1: 20+ years of experience in aluminum extrusion industry
aboutUs.point2: Deep knowledge of European and global markets
aboutUs.point3: Expertise in European standards and regulations
aboutUs.point4: Comprehensive training programs for industry professionals
aboutUs.point5: Marketing development and business growth strategies

categories.title: TRAINING
categories.description: We have a powerful training system for aluminum extrusion processes. Our system eliminates all operator doubts. It's visual, practical, and functional. We offer special training for managers.

categories.title: IMPROVE KPI (KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS)
categories.description: In collaboration with our customers, we define programs capable of improving productivity, reducing scrap, costs, and waste.

categories.title: TPM, TOYOTA TOOLS
categories.description: We have extensive experience installing TPM methods in extrusion lines. It is also possible to implement many different tools of the Toyota System, all developed for extrusion lines.

categories.title: DIE SHOP
categories.description: We have people capable of solving all problems related to dies. We cooperate with the best die makers. We develop dies for our customers. We have a system to reduce knock-off dies.

categories.title: MAINTENANCE
categories.description: With our help, it is possible to find solutions for your process with minimum investment. We develop preventive maintenance programs based on the experience of market leaders, sharing knowledge with our customers.

categories.title: DEVELOP PRODUCTS
categories.description: We have the knowledge to develop new products. We are capable of making drawings of profiles, etc. It is possible for us to help the customer find the best extruder for the product.

solutions.title: Optical Measuring Solutions
solutions.description: We provide comprehensive solutions and training for advanced optical measuring devices in aluminum extrusion quality control.

contact.contactUsDescription: Ready to optimize your manufacturing processes? Contact us today to discuss your specific needs and learn how our expertise can help drive your business forward.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We work with leading companies in the aluminum extrusion industry

companies.name: Jaza

companies.name: VK
companies.description: Operational excellence through integrated business solutions.

meta.title: Inalcom - Your Partner in Aluminium Extrusion
meta.description: Inalcom provides comprehensive consulting and training services for the aluminum extrusion industry. With over 20 years of experience, we specialize in process optimization, equipment efficiency, and workforce development. Our expertise covers training programs, KPI improvement, TPM implementation, die shop solutions, maintenance programs, and product development. We help companies enhance their aluminum extrusion operations through proven methodologies and industry best practices, ensuring sustainable growth and operational excellence.

Layout.title: inalcom
Layout.footnote1: Inalcom provides comprehensive consulting and training services for the aluminum extrusion industry. With over 20 years of experience, we specialize in process optimization, equipment efficiency, and workforce development. Our expertise covers training programs, KPI improvement, TPM implementation, die shop solutions, maintenance programs, and product development. We help companies enhance their aluminum extrusion operations through proven methodologies and industry best practices, ensuring sustainable growth and operational excellence.
Layout.footnote2: Inalcom website uses cookies to enhance your browser experience. These cookies can be used to remember changes you have made in our services. Please note that if you chose to block cookies, doing so may impair the Inalcom services or prevent certain of its elements from functioning.
Layout.footnote3: Inalcom is committed to protecting your privacy and keeping your personal information confidential. We maintain strict data security measures and will never share your contact details or personal information with third parties without your explicit consent.

DocsPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/test in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to Turkish, the URL is localized accordingly (/tr/deneme).
